#labels example,code
= Code example =
In this page you can see some examples of usage of the cUml code

== Model example ==
File test.u2sm
{{{
package org.cc{
  class Class1{
    attributes{
      public attribute1;
      public attribute2;
    }
    methods{
      private method1(int arg1);
      public method2(void arg);
    }
  }
}
}}}

== Layout example ==
File test.u2sl
{{{
import text.u2sm
[
  [
    @hide-args
    (class org.cc.Class1)
  ]
]
package org.cc{
  class Class1{
    attributes{
      public attribute1;
      public attribute2;
    }
    methods{
      private method1(int arg1);
      public method2(void arg);
    }
  }
}
}}}
